text: This is a list of Dutch television related events from 1983. ==Events== *23 February - Bernadette is selected to represent Netherlands at the 1983 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Sing Me a Song". She is selected to be the twenty-eighth Dutch Eurovision entry during Nationaal Songfestival held at Congresgebouw in The Hague. ==Debuts== *2 November – Postman Pat ==Television shows== ===1950s=== *NOS Journaal (1956–present) ===1970s=== *Sesamstraat (1976–present) ===1980s=== *Jeugdjournaal (1981–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *18 January - Emiel Sandtke, actor *15 November - Vivienne van den Assem, actress & TV presenter ==Deaths==
title: 1983 in Dutch television
